name: Catfishin' and Chill
description:
Local catfish in your area want to meet and chill out tonight!! Meet a match, and hope for the best! With enough persistence and the right match, unlock another game mode!

Created as an entry for the Little Awful Jam 2016

Controls
Easy Mode - Maximum Chill
- Use mouse to accept/deny various species of fish

Hard Mode - Zero Chill
- W - forward thrust
- A or D - turn left, turn right
- Space - Apply Brakes
- Mouse - Look, use equipment


Completion stats
- Jam Length - 2 weeks (8 Jan - 22 Jan 2016)
- Development Length - ~2 weeks
